results.name: CLOSE ENCOUNTERS OF THE THIRD KIND

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Blaster or equivalent
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2080 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster Z
  • Additional Notes: CPU recommended for expensive processing cost for path-finding, Network is needed to calculate daily procedural SEEDS. (Certain things change in game every Earth-Day)

  • Processor: i5-3210M
